entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm near midnight. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:38 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:38 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:38 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
